name: Interface TryTree
text:
A tree node for a 'try' statement.

 For example:
 
   try
       block
   catches
   finally
       finallyBlock
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface TryTree
extends StatementTree

methods.description: Returns the 'try' block of this 'try' statement.
Returns the list of 'catch' statements associated with this 'try'.

Returns the 'finally' block associated with this 'try'. This is
 null if there is no 'finally' block associated with this 'try'.
